document_api_meta.title: Calculate Refund
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to check order refundable amounts.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: request_type
request_body_param.desc:
Request type
- CANCEL
- REFUND
- RETURN_AND_REFUND
Note: different request types are used for different aftersales scenarios. Also, different request types might have different refund amounts, because the refund amount calculation policy is different.

request_body_param.name: shipment_type
request_body_param.desc:
How buyer ships items to seller when in a return request, could be:
- PLATFORM
- BUYER_ARRANGE

request_body_param.name: handover_method
request_body_param.desc:
Which handover method buyer chooses to use when returning goods to seller by platform
- DROP_OFF: buyer drops off the parcel in logistics service collect point.
- PICKUP: logistics service picks up the buyer package.

request_body_param.name: reason_name
request_body_param.desc: Seller's reason to create a return，all available reasons, please reference to API overview.

request_body_param.name: order_line_item_ids
request_body_param.desc: TikTok Shop order line item ids.

request_body_param.name: ^sku_id
request_body_param.desc: Quantity seller wants to create a return request.

request_body_param.name: ^quantity
request_body_param.desc: Sku id seller wants to create a return request.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^^refund_subtotal
response_param.desc: Total price of item be returned.

response_param.name: ^^retail_delivery_fee
response_param.desc: Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds 500,000 USD, according to US Colorado states' compliance rules.

error_code_list.msg: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func returnRefund202309CalculateRefundPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ReturnRefundV202309API.ReturnRefund202309RefundsCalculatePost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody()
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetOrderId("576469648086175911")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetRequestType("REFUND")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetShipmentType("PLATFORM")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetHandoverMethod("DROP_OFF")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetReasonName("ecom_order_delivered_refund_reason_missing_product_seller")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList := []string{"576469648086306986"}
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetOrderLineItemIds(returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList)
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus()
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus.SetSkuId("1729386416015578024")
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus.SetQuantity(1)
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkusList := []returnRefund_v202309.ReturnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus{*returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkus}
    returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody.SetSkus(returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBodySkusList)
    request = request.ReturnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody(*returnRefund202309CalculateRefundRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}
